name: Rainbow Roads
description:
Instructions:

Build bridges to connect islands together, explore them to find a teddy, and bring it to a little girl! Follow the arrows on the islands for a hint of which way to go.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move.

Use Keys 1 to 6 on your keyboard or click the icons at the bottom of the screen to select a Rainbow Tile.

Press Enter to set down the Rainbow Tile in front of you or pick up a teddy in front of you.

Press Backspace to delete the Rainbow Tile in front of you.

Careful not to fall off!
